descriptionHtml:
Say goodbye to the weak, slow, damn allies. Although it\'s not that creative, i thought it would be awesome to have better followers without the need for spending many hours making armors and weapons for them.

In this mod, I improved the health, speed, stamina, armors, weapons and the levels of the followers. For The Companions, I didn\'t change the armor for all of them, for some of them, i improved their armor and gave them all better enchanted weapons. 

If a follower uses a his Steel Shield, use \"i need to trade things with you\" and take it from him, this happens because i can\'t remove the default Steel Shield from their inventory. 
Make sure to backup your save file first.

I hope you like it. Please let me know if their are any problems
author: Chimera
